Detailed Description

template<class T>
class template_patterns::composite< T >

Composite template class.

The composite design pattern allows a client object to treat both single components and collections of components identically. All entities must implement the void execute(type_name &parent) function, which is called recursively through the composite tree.

Parameters:
T class to allow composite behaviour
